attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for my 1 year old sister because she was a Trump supporter. I mean she cried everyday and when we asked her why she would say it’s because Trump isn’t her father and she had to end up living in our family. Anyway when I downloaded the app it caused her phone to glitch and she ended up in a coma due to the shock. DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF YOU DON’T WANT TO END UP IN A COMA!!!

attributes.title: Horrible🤢
attributes.review: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE! This app makes me want to puke my guts out! The big orange man on the front is quite a disgusting sight! Kinda looks like a....🍊! App Store I’d advise to take this app down! Or I might just continue puking unstoppably until you take this app down!All this 🍊 man says is make America white again! Such a white supremacist! I can’t with this anymore! I HOPE YOU TAKE NOTES! 😡

attributes.title: loss of a loved one
attributes.review: This is the most horrendous app on the planet. My sister used to be a great soul, she’d help old folk cross the street and help those in need, she even helped a cancer patient from dying. What i’m trying to say is that she was a great person, she didn’t deserve what happened to her. She’s not dead, she just downloaded the app and become a trump supporter. This app is a horrific.

attributes.title: worst app ever🧚🏻🍊✨✨
attributes.review: this app is the worst ever, it deleted every other app in my phone and gave my dog fleas i then had to take my dog to the vet and they told me i had a cat, THIS APP STOLE MY DOG i’ve been crying for weeks and i can’t stop i’m crying as i’m writing this. This app also gave me a rash and now i can’t eat bananas or anything so now i’m skIIIIINNNNNNYYYYYY we need to take this app off the app store forever ✨✨🍊

attributes.title: Waste of time
attributes.review: I was a huge trump supporter in the last election, and I was hoping that this app would renew my faith in him. If anything, it cemented the fact that he is the worth president in American history and he will drag this country into the ground if he is elected again. Don’t waste your time on the app. It  also bugs and is just crap in general.

attributes.title: 👂 ears 😤
attributes.review: Oh lord! I’ve been living under a rock for a while so I’m not really up with the times, but I heard this guy is our president so I decided to check this app out. It is so sad to see that this is our president. Anyways because of this app I think I’m going to go cut my ears off because if this guy doesn’t listen to the people why should I?

attributes.title: For the orange man🧡🧡
attributes.review: I was a big fan of the Cheeto dust we call president🖤😘💕but after seeing this app I am disgusted 💛🤡🐣 I opened the app and the first thing I saw was his tiny orange ding a long 🤮🤢🤮 I’m so disappointed and dissatisfied with the Orange man right now🥺😢😭😥 how dare he do that to my innocent eyes😤😤 and then right after that a pteridophyte flew into my room and carried off my cat😭 I don’t recommend this app🧚🏻‍♀️👑🦄🐥🥞

attributes.title: Worst App Ever!!!
attributes.review: This app is very unorganized and confusing. I do not recommend it. It gives me nightmares because of how uncooperative it is. I’ve been reading other reviews and they also seem to dislike this app as well 💅🏼. I am very disappointed, and again, I do not recommend downloading this. I hope this review was helpful.

attributes.title: Hear me out...
attributes.review: I was very hesitant after reading the reviews but now that I have downloaded the app I see perfectly clear why everyone warned me. DO NOT GET THE APP. instantly my dog died, then it started pouring rain while I was walking my pet fish, and now? Well now I have to host a funeral but because of COVID-19 i cannot😭 no one will attend my dog funeral. Please someone come. She deserved the world. R I P Hershey

attributes.title: Absolutely Horrible Developing
attributes.review: I came here to support Trump. A year ago, this app was fine but after the update do you even realize what happened? Excuse me, but there are so many glitches. No, my Wi-fi is working but this app is just the worst. I recommend that you create a new app that composes of good quality and extreme support. Thank you.
